short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace new tab page with a personal note application

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features: 
- Synchronization multiple devices
- Text note
- Code note
- Vocabulary note

- Auto layout
- Pretty welcome page
- 100% Offline
- Open source
